Sql.query: INSERT INTO rer_sddp ( resddpcodi, reravcodi, resddpnomarchivo, resddpsemanaini, resddpanioini, resddpnroseries, resddpdiainicio, resddpusucreacion, resddpfeccreacion ) VALUES ( :resddpcodi, :reravcodi, :resddpnomarchivo, :resddpsemanaini, :resddpanioini, :resddpnroseries, :resddpdiainicio, :resddpusucreacion, :resddpfeccreacion )

update rer_sddp SET resddpcodi = :resddpcodi, reravcodi = :reravcodi, resddpnomarchivo = :resddpnomarchivo, resddpsemanaini = :resddpsemanaini, resddpanioini = :resddpanioini, resddpnroseries = :resddpnroseries, resddpdiainicio = :resddpdiainicio, resddpusucreacion = :resddpusucreacion, resddpfeccreacion = :resddpfeccreacion where resddpcodi = :resddpcodi
SELECT resddpcodi, reravcodi, resddpnomarchivo, resddpsemanaini, resddpanioini, resddpnroseries, resddpdiainicio, resddpusucreacion, resddpfeccreacion FROM rer_sddp ORDER BY resddpcodi ASC
SELECT resddpcodi, reravcodi, resddpnomarchivo, resddpsemanaini, resddpanioini, resddpnroseries, resddpdiainicio, resddpusucreacion, resddpfeccreacion FROM rer_sddp WHERE resddpcodi = :resddpcodi

SELECT resddpcodi, reravcodi, resddpnomarchivo, resddpsemanaini, resddpanioini, resddpnroseries, resddpdiainicio, resddpusucreacion, resddpfeccreacion FROM rer_sddp where (-1 = {0} or resddpcodi = {0})
